summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Type: const
Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: topLeftX
param.para: Type: FLOAT
X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: topLeftY
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: width
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Width of the viewport.

param.name: height
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Height of the viewport.

param.name: minDepth
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

param.name: maxDepth
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with D3D11_BUFFER_RTV values.

param.name: unnamedParam1
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Buffer interface for a buffer.

param.name: pRTView
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.

param.name: topLeftX
param.para: X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: minDepth
param.para: Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

param.name: maxDepth
param.para: Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_RTV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_RTV values.

param.name: pTex1D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.

param.name: pRTView
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.

param.name: topLeftX
param.para: X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: minDepth
param.para: Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

param.name: maxDepth
param.para: Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.

param.name: pTex2D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D interface for a 2D texture.

param.name: pRTView
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.

param.name: topLeftX
param.para: X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: topLeftY
param.para: Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: minDepth
param.para: Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

param.name: maxDepth
param.para: Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with 3D texture values.

param.name: pTex3D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture3D interface for a 3D texture.

param.name: pRTView
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.

param.name: topLeftX
param.para: X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: topLeftY
param.para: Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

param.name: minDepth
param.para: Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

param.name: maxDepth
param.para: Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure.
